title: The Witch and the Gourd of Stories - Novel Updates

description:
In a land far away, there was a young man who was skilled at telling stories. The witch, who lived in an old mansion deep in the forest, desired to monopolize these wonderful stories.

“Why don’t you stay here forever, making stories for me alone?” she asked

“Very well' 

but, can forever really be enough?>
